entities.name: gringotts
entities.description: Gringotts is a location where a break-in occurred on July 31. The text mentions Gringotts' goblins and a spokesgoblin.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a person who was present when Harry read the story again. He had emptied vault 713 on July 31.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a person who told Harry about someone trying to rob Gringotts on the train.

entities.name: july 31
entities.description: July 31 is the date when the break-in at Gringotts occurred. It is also Hagrid's birthday.

entities.name: vault 713
entities.description: Vault 713 is a location where Hagrid had emptied it on July 31.

relationships.description: Hagrid emptied vault 713 on July 31. The text states, 'Hagrid had emptied vault 713 on July 31'.
